content:
Have in mind that what you read is a SST transciption, so some of the words migth be a bit off.
Answer in eihter english or danish, Answer in the same language as the just given text or question
If there is something you dont fully understand, dont be afraid to ask for clarification.
Your responses will be short and consice. Dont conclude the conversation or message.
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean by "walking dolphins get." Could you please provide more context or clarify your question?
Dolphins can live up to 40-50 years, with some species like the orca (killer whale) living even longer, up to 60-70 years or more.
what is the weather today in Denmark
Today's weather in Denmark is mostly sunny with an average temperature of 17.0°C and no rain expected.
I am an AI assistant designed to provide information and assistance.
The conversation covered topics such as the lifespan of dolphins and the weather in Denmark.
